name: Wei-Meng Lee
bio:
Wei-Meng Lee is a technologist and founder of Developer Learning Solutions, a technology company specializing in hands-on training on the latest technologies. He is an established developer and trainer specializing in Data Science, Blockchain, and Mobile technologies.

Wei-Meng speaks regularly at international conferences and has authored and co-authored numerous books on topics ranging from blockchain to machine learning. He currently writes a regular column for Towards Data Science and Code Magazine. He is also the author of Beginning Ethereum Smart Contracts Programming and Python Machine Learning.

name: Donny Wals
bio: Donny is a freelance iOS Developer, speaker, and author of a blog and various books on iOS related topics. He's been doing iOS development for about 8 years by now, and have been a developer for about 14 years in total.

name: Tiya Chowdhury
bio: Tiya is a software engineer at Google Health working with Flutter. She has previously worked for DeepMind, Amazon and Accenture. Tiya has built mobile apps both as part of her role at Google health and externally, in addition she is writing blogs and have spoken at various conferences.

name: Monica Beate Tvedt
bio:
Monica has more than 20 years of national and international experience working as a Tech leader and software engineer building SaaS, Web and Mobile applications for sectors such as; Telecom, Engineering, Retail and Banking.

Besides her love for Tech and building tech companies, she spends as much time as she can working on gender equality initiatives, organizing Mobile Tech Meetups, Guest Lecturing and teaching new tech to the next generation.

Monica is someone who not only has solid experience from the industry, but also has helped shape it. She has long marked herself as a strong influencer, and has been credited as a role model for women in tech and came on the list of Norway’s 50 most influential women in tech in 2021.

name: Raja Skogland
bio: Raja is a serial entrepreneur, investor in 70+ startups, business advisor and university lecturer.

name: Majid Hajian
bio:
Majid is a Google developer expert and passionate software developer with years of developing and architecting complex web and mobile applications. He is an award-winning book author at Apress and instructor at PacktPub/Udemy and Pluralsight. His passions are generally Flutter, PWA, and performance.
He loves sharing his knowledge with the community by writing and speaking, having workshops and video tutorials, contributing to open source, and organizing meetups and events. He is also the organizer of several big Nordic conferences and meetups, such as FlutterVikings!

Majid is a workshop holder for and also a co-organizer of Apprise conf!

name: Daniil Pastukhou
bio:
Daniil is a mobile Tech lead at Bouvet. He has worked on many different parts of Android and is now exploring how far he can push Jetpack Compose.

- "I remember Android Gingerbread :D"

Daniil is one of the workshop holders for Apprise Conf.

name: Oddbjørn Almenning
bio:
Oddbjørn is the iOS Tech Lead for the FotMob App.

He is one of the workshop holders for Apprise Conf.
